Uses of Package
peregrine.io.storage

Packages that use peregrine.io.storage
peregrine.controller Main interface for the controller which allows one to kick off and execute jobs in the cluster. 
peregrine.controller.client Client interfaces for calling RPC endpoints on the controller. 
peregrine.controller.rpcd RPC entry point for the controller. 
peregrine.io.storage Metadata about files created on the local filesystem for usage by the controller to look for data imbalances with shuffle, data, balance data base on disk usages, and to help sysadmins and developers understand file system distribution within the cluster. 
 

Classes in peregrine.io.storage used by peregrine.controller
GlobalFileLookup
           
 

Classes in peregrine.io.storage used by peregrine.controller.client
GlobalFileIndex
          Represents the computed storage metadata from GlobalFileLookup.
LocalFileIndex
          Index of all files on a worker.
 

Classes in peregrine.io.storage used by peregrine.controller.rpcd
GlobalFileIndex
          Represents the computed storage metadata from GlobalFileLookup.
LocalFileIndex
          Index of all files on a worker.
 

Classes in peregrine.io.storage used by peregrine.io.storage
ChunkMeta
          MetaData about a chunk within an individual file.
FileMeta
          Metadata about a chunked file.
GlobalFileIndex
          Represents the computed storage metadata from GlobalFileLookup.
LocalFileIndex
          Index of all files on a worker.
LocalFileReference
          Maps between FileMeta and ChunkMeta for a file on the local worker.
